eventDecorators.name: AlgorithmUpdated
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token.

eventDecorators.name: DigestUpdated
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token.

eventDecorators.name: Marker
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token.

eventDecorators.name: NSEC3DigestUpdated
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token.

eventDecorators.name: RRSetUpdated
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token.

eventDecorators.name: Test
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a user has unstaked a token.

functionDecorators.name: deleteRRSet
functionDecorators.description: Deletes an RR from the oracle.

parameterDecorators.name: deleteType
parameterDecorators.description: The DNS record type to delete.

parameterDecorators.name: nsec
parameterDecorators.description: The signed NSEC RRset. This is in the format described in section 5.3.2 of RFC4035: The RRDATA section from the RRSIG without the signature data, followed by a series of canonicalised RR records that the signature applies to.

functionDecorators.name: rrdata
functionDecorators.description: Returns data about the RRs (if any) known to this oracle with the provided type and name.

parameterDecorators.name: dnstype
parameterDecorators.description: The DNS record type to query.

parameterDecorators.name: name
parameterDecorators.description: The name to query, in DNS label-sequence format.

functionDecorators.name: setAlgorithm
functionDecorators.description: Sets the contract address for a signature verification algorithm. Callable only by the owner.

parameterDecorators.name: algo
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the algorithm contract.

functionDecorators.name: setDigest
functionDecorators.description: Sets the contract address for a digest verification algorithm. Callable only by the owner.

parameterDecorators.name: digest
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the digest contract.

functionDecorators.name: setNSEC3Digest
functionDecorators.description: Sets the contract address for an NSEC3 digest algorithm. Callable only by the owner.

parameterDecorators.name: digest
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the digest contract.

functionDecorators.name: submitRRSet
functionDecorators.description: Submits a signed set of RRs to the oracle. * RRSETs are only accepted if they are signed with a key that is already trusted, or if they are self-signed, and the signing key is identified by a DS record that is already trusted.

parameterDecorators.name: input
parameterDecorators.description: The signed RR set. This is in the format described in section 5.3.2 of RFC4035: The RRDATA section from the RRSIG without the signature data, followed by a series of canonicalised RR records that the signature applies to.

parameterDecorators.name: sig
parameterDecorators.description: The signature data from the RRSIG record.

parameterDecorators.name: proof
parameterDecorators.description: The DNSKEY or DS to validate the signature against. Must Already have been submitted and proved previously.

parameterDecorators.name: data
parameterDecorators.description: The data to submit, as a series of chunks. Each chunk is in the format <uint16 length><bytes input><uint16 length><bytes sig>.

parameterDecorators.name: _proof
parameterDecorators.description: The DNSKEY or DS to validate the first signature against.
